action.content: DESCRIPTION: The room has peach-colored walls and a beige carpet. There is a wooden bed frame with a red and white plaid blanket partially visible in the foreground. Against one wall, there is a wooden door with a black jacket hanging on a hook. Next to the door is a wooden shelving unit holding a vintage computer monitor and a stack of papers or books. A black office chair is positioned in front of the shelving unit. There is also a small gray filing cabinet near the corner of the room.
action.label: response
